name: English Longbow Rush
description: The quintessential English opening. Focuses on rapid transition into [icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age for constant [icon:longbowman] Longbowmen pressure.

steps.description: Queue [icon:villager] villagers. Send 6 starting villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. [icon:rally] Rally [icon:scout] scout to find more sheep.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:wood] wood.
Send next 3 [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:wood] wood. (Total 4 on wood).
New [icon:villager] builds [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold. [icon:rally] Rally next villager to gold. (Total 2 on gold).
Send next 2 [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:food] food. (Total 8 on food).
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:council_hall] Council Hall! Use 2 [icon:villager] villagers from [icon:wood] wood to build.
[icon:rally] Rally all new [icon:villager] villagers to [icon:food] food while aging up.
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age reached! Immediately queue [icon:longbowman] Longbowmen. Send builders back to [icon:wood] wood.
Research [icon:wheelbarrow] Wheelbarrow. Build [icon:blacksmith] Blacksmith for ranged [icon:upgrade] upgrades.
[icon:attack] Constant production! Send 6-8 [icon:longbowman] to harass enemy wood line. Build [icon:barracks] Barracks for [icon:spearman] Spearmen support.
[icon:outpost] Build Outpost on [icon:gold] gold. Use 1 [icon:villager] from [icon:food] food.
Build [icon:barracks] Barracks. Produce [icon:spearman] Spearmen to counter [icon:horseman] horsemen.
